snippet: MILLER--Miriam (Mimi), daughter of John and Dora Turteltaub, born on July 1, 1924 passed away peacefully in her home on April 21, 2016. A lifelong New Jersey resident, Mimi attended Wellesley College, and later in life earned her law degree, becoming an Assistant Dean at Rutgers Law School. Mimi was a generous and joyful gift giver, and never said no when asked for a donation. Miriam is survived and will be missed by sister Joan Rosenbaum (Joseph), sister-in-law Lenore Turteltaub, children Ellen Miller, Gail Miller, Theodore Miller (Liz), and Sara Bleemer (Hugh); six grandchildren and one great grand-daughter. 1/3

Mimi was a generous and joyful gift giver, and never said no when asked for a donation. Miriam is survived and will be missed by sister Joan Rosenbaum (Joseph), sister-in-law Lenore Turteltaub, children Ellen Miller, Gail Miller, Theodore Miller (Liz), and Sara Bleemer (Hugh); six grandchildren and one great grand-daughter. 1/3
